Sentencas: One of the main challenges in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is the redox problem of Ni-based anodes.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Therefore, the redox tolerance of the anode should be improved to increase the service life of the system.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Since the real SOFC anodes have a heterogeneous structure with different grain sizes, a micro-level modeling is necessary.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Especially, the re-oxidation step which creates large amount of stress is critical during the redox cycles.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Therefore, in this study, the effects of re-oxidation temperatures and exposure times on the oxidation rate and stresses developed are investigated on a synthetically generated porous anode functional layer microstructure.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: A mathematical model is developed to characterize the re-oxidation process and solved numerically.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The results indicate that the re-oxidation strongly depends on the re-oxidation temperature and exposure time.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The time required for the full oxidation is found to be 7458.55, 313.14, 200.8 and 33.78 s at 800, 850, 900 and 950 degrees C, respectively for the generated anode microstructure.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes

Sentencas: In addition, the created stresses in the anode structure are well above the critical material limits.
Titulo: Microstructural finite element modeling of redox behavior of Ni-YSZ based ceramic SOFC anodes
